description:
This course summaries numerous conversations between my friend and a spirit. These sessions began on a more personal level but overtime a very specific picture about life, and death began to emerge.

While researching the subject I discovered that this information is shared by many. For me this was proof enough that there is something to it.

Hopefully this course will open the window for you to a whole new world or at the very least help you to remove the fear of death from your life.

This course will answer some very interesting questions such as:

What happens after you die?

Does Heaven exist?

Does Hell exist?

How is life in Heaven?

What is our purpose on earth?

What happens to â€œbad people" after they die?

Does prayer work?

Who or what is God?

What are ghosts exactly?

How are extraterrestrial beings connected to all of this?

And many more.
title: What happens to you after you die?
